input_args.passage: "Church of St. Mary of the Spring, Istanbul | The local name of the church is Balıklı Meryem Ana Rum Ortodoks monasteries, also known as Monestry of Our Lady of Spring is located in Istanbul's Zeytinburnu ... Rating: 4.5, \u200e23 reviews"
input_args.claim: 'It is specifically located in the district of Zeytinburnu in the neighbourhood of Balıklı, along Balıklı Sivrikapı Sokak, according to source.'
